author: veithen
msg: Also use the DetachPolicy API for coreRemoveChildren.

author: rfscholte
msg: Make ArtifactCoordinate an interface, so other Objects can simply implement it. E.g. o.a.m.p.dependency.fromConfiguration.ArtifactItem needs some extra fields, but it already has all the methods of ArtifactCoordinate. Now we can simple pass ArtifactItem to the resolver without assembling a new Object.

author: veithen
msg: Reimplement the DOM getTextContent method using coreGetTextContent.
